text: Madagascar Kartz is a racing game based on DreamWorks Animation's Madagascar. It was released in 2009. The game was released in 2009. The Nintendo DS version was re-released together with Shrek's Carnival Craze Party Games. == Gameplay == The game is a basic kart racing game and the player can perform jumps, flips, and rolls. Characters include Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe, Gloria the Hippopotamus, The Penguins, The Chimps, and King Julien from the Madagascar and Escape 2 Africa films. Two characters from other movies is a Shrek from Shrek, and B.O.B. from Monsters vs. Aliens, all DreamWorks Animation franchises. Race types include Quick Race, Championship, Time Trial and Checkpoint race. A Championship race is one where the player collects mangoes and tries to finish first place. In Time Trial, players beat their own times and earn medals (gold, silver and bronze). In Checkpoint Race, players collects hourglasses before the time runs out.
